suite.name: Valid Register Suite

kw.name: Launch Browser And Navigate To Demo App
Get Driver Path
kw.msg: Get LATEST chromedriver version for google-chrome 106.0.5249

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Register
kw.doc: Click on Register Link

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: Types the given text into username field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Types the given text into password field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Firstname
kw.doc: Types the given text into firstname field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Familyname
kw.doc: Types the given text into familyname field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Phone
kw.doc: Types the given text into password field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Register Button
kw.doc: Click on Register Button

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validate LogIn Header
kw.doc: Click on Register Button

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: message=Login Page should have been displayed
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//section[@class='content']//h1' contains exact text 'Log In'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Login
kw.doc: Click on Login Link

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Login Username
kw.doc: Types the given text into username field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Login Password
kw.doc: Types the given text into password field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Login Button
kw.doc: Click on Login Button

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validate Invalid Login Error And Tooltip
kw.doc: Verify tooltip and error message

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: return document.querySelector('#password').validationMessage Without any arguments.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: message=User should have been displayed with message as 'You provided incorrect login details'
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
